newsitem.title: USA: Mississippi to sell $111 million GOs on Sept 11.
newsitem.headline: Mississippi to sell $111 million GOs on Sept 11.

text.p: Mississippi will sell $111 million of general obligation bonds by competitive bid at 1500 EDT Sept 11, the State Bond Commission said.
The bonds are designated Capital Improvement Issue Series 1996 and Local Government Capital Improvements Revolving Loan Program Issue Series E and will have maturities out to 20 years.
Proceeds will finance construction and renovation projects including improvements at the Hattiesburg Zoo, a jail for mentally handicapped juveniles, and buildings for several state agencies.
